mapper.select: SELECT A.NA_BZPLC /* 사업장 코드 */ , A.AUC_OBJ_DSC /* 경매대상구분코드*/ , A.AUC_RECV_DT /* 접수일자 */ , A.AUC_RECV_NO /* 접수번호 */ , A.AUC_DT /* 경매일자 */ , A.AUC_PRG_SQ /* 경매번호 */ , A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO /* 개체번호 */ , A.RECV_CAN_YN /* 예약취소여부 */ , A.RECV_CAN_DT /* 취소일자 */ , A.VHC_SHRT_C /* 차량단축코드 */ , A.TRPCS_PY_YN /* 운송비 지급여부 */ , A.SRA_TRPCS /* 추가운송비 */ , A.SRA_FED_SPY_AM /* 사료대금 */ , A.FHS_ID_NO /* 농가식별번호 */ , A.FARM_AMNNO /* 농장관리번호 */ , A.BRCL_ISP_DT /* 브루셀라 검사일자 */ , A.VACN_DT /* 백신접종일자 */ , A.RMK_CNTN /* 비고 */ , A.PPGCOW_FEE_DSC /* 임신구분 */ , A.AFISM_MOD_DT /* 인공수정일자 */ , A.MOD_KPN_NO /* 수정KPN */ , A.PRNY_MTCN /* 임신개월수 */ , A.PTUR_PLA_DT /* 분만예정일 */ , A.PRNY_JUG_YN /* 임신감정여부 */ , A.NCSS_JUG_YN /* 괴사감정여부 */ , A.DNA_YN_CHK /* 친자감정여부 */ , A.DNA_JUG_RESULT /* 친자감정결과 */ , A.DNA_SAMPLED_YN /* 모근채취여부 */ , A.DEBT_CANCEL_YN /* */ , A.DEBD_CANCEL_YN /* 제각여부 */ , A.CCOW_SRA_INDV_AMNNO /* 송아지 귀표번호 */ , A.LOC_GB /* 지역구분 */ , A.FSRG_DTM /* 최초등록일자 */ , A.FSRGMN_ENO /* 최초등록자 개인번호 */ , NVL((SELECT F.USRNM FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_USR F WHERE F.NA_BZPLC = A.NA_BZPLC AND F.USRID = A.FSRGMN_ENO), 'SYSTEM') AS FSRGMN_NM /* 최초등록자 */ , A.LSCHG_DTM /* 최종수정일자 */ , A.LS_CMENO /* 최종수정자 개인번호 */ , NVL((SELECT F.USRNM FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_USR F WHERE F.NA_BZPLC = A.NA_BZPLC AND F.USRID = A.LS_CMENO), 'SYSTEM') AS LSCHG_NM /* 최종수정자 */ , B.BIRTH /* 생년월일 */ , TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(A.AUC_DT, B.BIRTH))+1 AS MTCN /* 월령 */ , B.MCOW_DSC /* 어미구분 */ , B.KPN_NO /* KPN 번호 */ , B.INDV_SEX_C /* 개체 성별코드 */ , B.MCOW_SRA_INDV_AMNNO /* 어미 개체번호 */ , B.MATIME /* 산차 */ , B.SRA_INDV_PASG_QCN /* 계대 */ , B.INDV_ID_NO /* 개체식별번호 */ , B.SRA_INDV_BRDSRA_RG_NO /* 축산개체종축등록번호 */ , B.RG_DSC /* 등록구분 */ , CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN C.FTSNM WHEN LENGTH(C.FTSNM) = 2 THEN SUBSTR(C.FTSNM,1,1) || '*' WHEN LENGTH(C.FTSNM) = 3 THEN SUBSTR(C.FTSNM,1,1) || '*' || SUBSTR(C.FTSNM,3,1) WHEN LENGTH(C.FTSNM) = 4 THEN SUBSTR(C.FTSNM,1,1) || '**' || SUBSTR(C.FTSNM,4,1) WHEN LENGTH(C.FTSNM) >= 5 THEN SUBSTR(C.FTSNM,1,2) || '**' || SUBSTR(C.FTSNM,5,1) END AS FTSNM /* 농가명 */ , CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN NVL(C.SRA_FARM_ACNO, C.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO) ELSE CASE WHEN ( C.SRA_FARM_ACNO = '' OR C.SRA_FARM_ACNO IS NULL ) THEN CASE WHEN LENGTH(C.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO) = 12 THEN SUBSTR(C.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO,1,8)||'****' WHEN LENGTH(C.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO) = 13 THEN SUBSTR(C.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO,1,9)||'****' WHEN LENGTH(C.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO) = 14 THEN SUBSTR(C.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO,1,10)||'****' WHEN LENGTH(C.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO) = 15 THEN SUBSTR(C.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO,1,11)||'****' WHEN LENGTH(C.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO) = 16 THEN SUBSTR(C.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO,1,12)||'****' WHEN LENGTH(C.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO) = 17 THEN SUBSTR(C.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO,1,13)||'****' WHEN LENGTH(C.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO) >= 18 THEN SUBSTR(C.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO,1,14)||'****' ELSE C.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO END ELSE CASE WHEN LENGTH(C.SRA_FARM_ACNO) = 12 THEN SUBSTR(C.SRA_FARM_ACNO,1,8)||'****' WHEN LENGTH(C.SRA_FARM_ACNO) = 13 THEN SUBSTR(C.SRA_FARM_ACNO,1,9)||'****' WHEN LENGTH(C.SRA_FARM_ACNO) = 14 THEN SUBSTR(C.SRA_FARM_ACNO,1,10)||'****' WHEN LENGTH(C.SRA_FARM_ACNO) = 15 THEN SUBSTR(C.SRA_FARM_ACNO,1,11)||'****' WHEN LENGTH(C.SRA_FARM_ACNO) = 16 THEN SUBSTR(C.SRA_FARM_ACNO,1,12)||'****' WHEN LENGTH(C.SRA_FARM_ACNO) = 17 THEN SUBSTR(C.SRA_FARM_ACNO,1,13)||'****' WHEN LENGTH(C.SRA_FARM_ACNO) >= 18 THEN SUBSTR(C.SRA_FARM_ACNO,1,14)||'****' ELSE C.SRA_FARM_ACNO END END END AS SRA_FARM_ACNO /* 계좌번호 */ , CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN C.CUS_MPNO WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-','')) = 9 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,2) || '-***-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),6,4) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-','')) = 10 THEN (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,2) = '02' THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,2) || '-****-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),7,4) ELSE SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,3) || '-***-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),7,4) END) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-','')) IN (11,12) THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),1,3) || '-****-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.CUS_MPNO),'-',''),8,4) END AS CUS_MPNO /* 농가 휴대전화번호 */ , CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN C.OHSE_TELNO WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.OHSE_TELNO),'-','')) = 9 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),1,2) || '-***-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),6,4) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.OHSE_TELNO),'-','')) = 10 THEN (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),1,2) = '02' THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),1,2) || '-****-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),7,4) ELSE SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),1,3) || '-***-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),7,4) END) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.OHSE_TELNO),'-','')) IN (11,12) THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),1,3) || '-****-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(RTRIM(C.OHSE_TELNO),'-',''),8,4) END AS OHSE_TELNO /* 농가 전화번호 */ , C.DONGUP /* 주소 */ , CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN C.DONGBW ELSE '*****' END AS DONGBW /* 동이하주소 */ , C.SRA_FED_SPY_YN /* 사료 사용여부 */ , CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN D.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM WHEN LENGTH(D.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM) = 2 THEN SUBSTR(D.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM,1,1) || '*' WHEN LENGTH(D.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM) = 3 THEN SUBSTR(D.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM,1,1) || '*' || SUBSTR(D.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM,3,1) WHEN LENGTH(D.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM) = 4 THEN SUBSTR(D.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM,1,1) || '**' || SUBSTR(D.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM,4,1) WHEN LENGTH(D.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM) >= 5 THEN SUBSTR(D.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM,1,2) || '**' || SUBSTR(D.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM,5,1) END AS VHC_DRV_CAFFNM /* 수송자명 */ FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_COW_RECV A INNER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV B ON ( A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = B.SRA_INDV_AMNNO ) INNER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS C ON ( A.NA_BZPLC = C.NA_BZPLC AND A.FHS_ID_NO = C.FHS_ID_NO AND A.FARM_AMNNO = C.FARM_AMNNO ) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_VHC D ON ( A.NA_BZPLC = D.NA_BZPLC AND A.VHC_SHRT_C = D.VHC_SHRT_C ) WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = #{hdn_auc_obj_dsc} AND A.AUC_RECV_NO = #{hdn_auc_recv_no} AND A.AUC_RECV_DT = #{hdn_auc_recv_dt}

SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(AUC_DT), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS AUC_DT , AUC_PRG_SQ , AUC_RECV_NO , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(AUC_RECV_DT), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS AUC_RECV_DT FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_COW_RECV WHERE AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND SRA_INDV_AMNNO = #{re_indv_no}
